name: LVL (itch)
description:
Welcome to lvl (pronounced level), a game about building the best platform level you can.

This game was made in 7 days in my spare time (so realistically 2 days) for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM # 1

The theme was to make a game about game development and this was my attempt.

I hope you like it and I look forward to seeing your wacky level creations on social media.

Share your screenshots/videos with the #lvlisawesome
